name: Monster Slaying
baseDescription: Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 1%.

name: Humanoid Slaying
baseDescription: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 1%.

name: Entrapment
baseDescription: Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 10% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 sec.

name: Savage Strikes
baseDescription: Increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by 10%.

name: Improved Wing Clip
baseDescription: Gives your Wing Clip ability a 4% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

name: Clever Traps
baseDescription: Increases the duration of Freezing and Frost trap effects by 15% and the damage of Immolation and Explosive trap effects by 15%.

name: Deterrence
baseDescription: When activated, increases your Dodge and Parry chance by 25% for 10 sec.

name: Trap Mastery
baseDescription: Decreases the chance enemies will resist trap effects by 5%.

name: Surefooted
baseDescription: Increases hit chance by 3% and increases the chance movement impairing effects will be resisted by an additional 15%.

name: Improved Feign Death
baseDescription: Reduces the chance your Feign Death ability will be resisted by 2%.

name: Killer Instinct
baseDescription: Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by 1%.

name: Counterattack
baseDescription: A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack.  This attack deals 40 damage and immobilizes the target for 5 sec.  Counterattack cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

name: Wyvern Sting
baseDescription: A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 12 sec.  Any damage will cancel the effect.  When the target wakes up, the Sting causes 300 Nature damage over 12 sec.  Only usable out of combat.  Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.
